move.Name: Meditate

move.Effect: The user's Psychic-Type Moves can now hit and affect Dark-Type targets. Miracle Eye's user is unaffected by the effects of Moves which make them have to roll higher during Accuracy Checks to hit. Targets may not use their Speed stat to modify Accuracy Checks. Miracle Eye's user can identify the real target using Double Team.
move.Name: Miracle Eye

move.Effect: If the user is being hit by a Move that consults Special Attack for damage, you may use Mirror Coat. If the user survives the hit, the target is dealt damage equal to twice the amount of damage the user received. Do not apply weakness, resistance or immunity. Do not apply stats.
move.Name: Mirror Coat

move.Effect: Mist Ball creates a Column 1 meter wide and creates a 5-meter Blast. Mist Ball lowers all Legal Targets Special Attack 1 Combat Stage on 6-20 during Accuracy Check.
move.Name: Mist Ball

move.Effect: Choose between Attack and Special Attack. The target reveals the value of whichever stat you chose, and then adds it to the user's stat of the same choice. Divide the total by two and call the result X. For the remainder of the encounter, the target and the user's stat that you chose is X.
move.Name: Power Split

move.Effect: The user trades the stat value of their Attack and Special Attack, for the target's Attack and Special Attack for the rest of the encounter. Combat Stages are not traded. Power Swap cannot miss.
move.Name: Power Swap

move.Effect: The user's Attack stat and Defense stat are switched for 1+1d8 rounds.
move.Name: Power Trick

move.Effect: Psybeam creates a Column 1 meter wide. Psybeam Confuses all Legal Targets on 19-20 during Accuracy Check.
move.Name: Psybeam

move.Effect: The target is Pushed 5-meters in any direction. Psychic lowers the target's Special Defense 1 Combat Stage on 17-20 during Accuracy Check.
move.Name: Psychic

move.Effect: Psycho Boost creates a 4-meter Blast. Lower the user's Special Attack 2 Combat Stages after damage.
move.Name: Psycho Boost

move.Effect: Psycho Cut is a Critical Hit on 18-20 during Accuracy Check.
move.Name: Psycho Cut

move.Effect: The user is cured of a Status ailment and the target is given that Status ailment. Psycho Shift cannot miss. Psycho Shift can only be used if the user has a Status ailment and the target does not have the status ailment that is being transferred.
move.Name: Psycho Shift

move.Effect: When calculating damage, the target must use their Defense against Psyshock.
move.Name: Psyshock

move.Effect: When calculating damage, the target must use their Defense against Psystrike.
move.Name: Psystrike

move.Effect: Psywave creates a Column 2-meters wide. Roll 1d4; on 1 and 2 all Legal Targets lose HP equal to half the user's level; on 3, all Legal Targets lose HP equal to the user's level; on 4 all Legal Targets lose HP equal to 1.5x the user's level. Do not apply weakness, resistance or immunity. Do not apply stats.
move.Name: Psywave

move.Effect: The user may shift while placing Reflect Walls if their Speed allows for the extra movement. Place 5-meters of Wall that cannot be passed through but may be attacked through. If a Move tries to attack through Reflect Walls, treat the target as if their Defense is raised 2 Combat Stages. This bonus cannot be awarded more then once. The walls remain for 1d4+1 turns.
move.Name: Reflect

move.Effect: The user's HP is set to their full HP. The user is cured of any Status ailments. Then, the user falls Asleep. The user cannot make Sleep Checks at the beginning of their turn. They are cured of the Sleep at the end of their turn, in 2 rounds.
move.Name: Rest

move.Effect: Add on of the target's Ability to the user's Abilities for 1+1d8 rounds. Role Play cannot miss.
move.Name: Role Play

move.Effect: The user loses their Abilities and gains the target's Abilities for the remainder of encounter. The target loses their Abilities and gains the user's Abilities for the remainder of the encounter.
move.Name: Skill Swap

move.Effect: For every Combat Stage the user is above 0, in each stat, add 1d10 to Stored Power's Damage Dice Roll.
move.Name: Stored Power

move.Effect: Synchronoise creates a 6-meter Burst. Synchronoise can only hit legal targets that share a type with Synchronoise's user.
move.Name: Synchronoise

move.Effect: For 1d4+1 turns, the target is immune to Ground-type Moves and whenever the target is targeted by a Move, the Move's user needs -5 to hit. Telekinesis' effect cannot stack, if a target is already under the effect of Telekinesis, the newest successful instance of Telekinesis replaces the old one.
move.Name: Telekinesis

move.Effect: Teleport can be used as an Intercept at any time. If used as an Intercept, roll 1d20 and if you don't roll 7 or higher, Teleport fails to activate. The user can shift 1d10+10 meters. They can move through blocking terrain and hindering terrain as if it is regular terrain. Moves that targeted Teleport's user continues through the desired target's space if the Move allows for it. If Teleport fails when used as an Intercept, treat it as if you did not use it for purposes of Frequency.
move.Name: Teleport

move.Effect: Both targets must be hit for Trick to succeed. If Trick targets the user, you do not need to roll an Accuracy Check for the user. Both targets lose their Held Item, and gain the other target's Held Item. If a target has no Held Item, the still can gain the other target's Held Item.
move.Name: Trick

move.Effect: For 1d4+1 rounds, the area is considered Rewinding. While Rewinding, the order in which combatants go during a round of Combat isn't ordered from highest Speed to lowest Speed; instead it is order from lowest Speed to Highest Speed. Rewinding does not replace other Weather effects.
move.Name: Trick Room

move.Effect: For 1d4+1 rounds, the area is considered Wondered. While Wondered, each individual Pokemon's Defense and Special Defense are switched. Wondered does not replace other Weather effects.
move.Name: Wonder Room

move.Effect: Zen Headbutt Flinches the target on 15-20 during Accuracy Check.
move.Name: Zen Headbutt

move.Effect: Ancientpower creates a Column that is 2-meters wide. If you rolled 11-20 during Accuracy Check for Ancientpower, the user has each of its stats raised 1 Combat Stage. If you rolled 16-20 on the Accuracy Roll, all allies in the Column also have each of their stats raised 1 Combat Stage and are not damaged by Ancientpower.
move.Name: Ancientpower

move.Effect: The target is pushed back 5-meters. The target takes an additional 1d6 if it is Pushed into Blocking Terrain. If the target is pushed into another Legal Target, instead, both take 1d6. After Head Smash deals damage, Recoil.
move.Name: Head Smash

move.Effect: Rock Blast can hit up to 5 times. Once the user misses, they cannot attempt to make another Rock Blast attack on that turn.
move.Name: Rock Blast

move.Effect: Raise the user's Speed 2 Combat Stages.
move.Name: Rock Polish

move.Effect: Rock Slide creates a Column 4-meters wide. Rock Slide Flinches all Legal Targets on 17-20 during Accuracy Check.
move.Name: Rock Slide

move.Effect: Rock Tomb creates a 3-meter Blast. Rock Tomb lowers all Legal Targets Speed 1 Combat Stage.
move.Name: Rock Tomb

move.Effect: On Miss, Rock Wrecker deals the user's Attack instead to all possible targets.
move.Name: Rock Wrecker

move.Effect: The user must use Rollout until it misses, or fails to be able to shift enough to hit a target for their next 4 turns. On the second turn, Rollout uses 2d10+8 for its Damage Dice Roll. On the third turn, Rollout uses 2d10+12. On the fourth turn, Rollout uses 3d10+16. On the fifth and final turn, Rollout uses 4d10+10.
move.Name: Rollout

move.Effect: For 1d4+1 rounds, the area is considered Sandstorming. At the beginning of each round, all non-Ground, Rock, or Steel Type Pokemon lose 1/16th of their full HP. Rock Type Pokemon are treated as if their Special Defense is raised 2 Combat Stages while Sandstorming.
move.Name: Sandstorm

move.Effect: If the target is Flying-type or is floating because of Magnet Rise, Telekenisis, or Levitate, then the target is no longer immune to Ground-type Moves for 1d4+1 turns.
move.Name: Smack Down

move.Effect: Set 5 square meters of Stealth Rock, "Rocks." All 5 Rocks must be adjacent with at least one other space of Rocks next to each other. If a foe moves within 10 meters of a space occupied by Rocks, move at most one Rock to the offender, then destory the Rock. When that happens, Stealth Rock causes a foe to lose 1/8th of their full HP. Stealth Rock is considered to be dealing damage. Apply Weakness and Resistance. Do not apply stats. A Pokemon who has been hit by a Stealth Rock Hazard cannot get hit by another in the same encounter until it is returned to a Poke Ball and then sent back out.
move.Name: Stealth Rock

move.Effect: Stone Edge is a Critical Hit on 17-20 during Accuracy Check.
move.Name: Stone Edge

move.Effect: If a foe uses Move that hits multiple targets and Wide Guard's user is one of the targets you may use Wide Guard as an Interrupt. If a Move would hit the user and one of the user's allies, the Move only hits Wide Guard's user. If the user is hit by a Move this way, the user does not take any damage and is not affected by any other effects the Move has. This Effect lasts for one turn.
move.Name: Wide Guard

move.Effect: For the remainder of the Encounter, the user's Wieght Class is one value lower, to a minimum of 1. Raise the user's Speed 2 Combat Stages.
move.Name: Autotomize

move.Effect: If a foe wants to declare a Move, you may instead use Bullet Punch on their turn before they can use their Move.
move.Name: Bullet Punch

move.Effect: Doom Desire does nothing on the turn it is used. At the end of the second turn after Doom Desire's use, use Doom Desire's damage and effect. Doom Desire creates a Column 1 meter wide, which starts from anywhere on the field. Doom Desire is Typeless.
move.Name: Doom Desire

move.Effect: Flash Cannon lowers the target's Special Defense 1 Combat Stage on 17-20 during Accuracy Check.
move.Name: Flash Cannon

move.Effect: Gear Grind can hit up to 2 times. If Gear Grind misses its first target, you may still use it a second time.
move.Name: Gear Grind

move.Effect: For every 10 Speed the target is above the user, add 1d12 to the Damage dice Roll. Gyro Ball cannot miss.
move.Name: Gyro Ball

move.Effect: If the user is in the same Weight Class as the target, use 1d10 for Damage Dice Roll; if the user is one Weight Class higher than the target, use 1d10+10; if the user is two Weight Classes higher than the target, use 2d12+12; if three classes, 3d10+14; if four classes, 5d10+16.
move.Name: Heavy Slam

move.Effect: Raise the user's Defense 2 Combat Stages.
move.Name: Iron Defense

move.Effect: Iron Head Flinches the target on 15-20 during Accuracy Check.
move.Name: Iron Head

move.Effect: Iron Tail lowers the target's Defense 1 Combat Stage on 19-20 during Accuracy Check.
move.Name: Iron Tail

move.Effect: Magnet Bomb cannot miss.
move.Name: Magnet Bomb

move.Effect: Metal Burst may only be used if the user didn't move first in the round and the user has taken damage from a Move this round. The Target is dealt damage equal to 1.5x the amount of damage the user received during the last Move that hit it. Do not apply weakness, resistance or immunity. Do not apply stats.
move.Name: Metal Burst

move.Effect: Raise the user's Attack 1 Combat Stage on 18-20 during Accuracy Check.
move.Name: Metal Claw

move.Effect: Metal Sound creates a 4-meter Burst. All Legal Targets have their Special Defense lowered 2 Combat Stages.
move.Name: Metal Sound

move.Effect: Raise the user's Attack 1 Combat Stage on 15-20 during Accuracy Check.
move.Name: Meteor Mash

move.Effect: Mirror Shot creates a Column 1 meter wide. All Legal Targets must roll +2 during Accuracy Checks to hit on 16-20 during Accuracy Check.
move.Name: Mirror Shot

move.Effect: Raise the user's Attack 1 Combat Stage and raise the user's Speed 2 Combat Stages.
move.Name: Shift Gear

move.Effect: Raise the user's Defense 1 Combat Stage on 15-20 during Accuracy Check.
move.Name: Steel Wing

move.Effect: If a foe wants to declare a Move, you may instead use Aqua Jet on their turn before they can use their Move.
move.Name: Aqua Jet

move.Effect: Aqua Ring covers the user in a Coat that heals the user at the beginning of each of their turns. The user is healed 1/16th of their full HP each turn.
move.Name: Aqua Ring

move.Effect: If the target is below 50% HP, Brine deals 5d12+22 during Damage Dice Roll.
move.Name: Brine

move.Effect: Bubble lowers the target's Speed on 16-20 during Accuracy Check.
move.Name: Bubble

move.Effect: Bubblebeam creates a Column 1 meter wide. Bubblebeam lowers the target's Speed on 18-20 during Accuracy Check.
move.Name: Bubblebeam

move.Effect: Clamp Traps the target and the user for 1d4+1 turns. At the beginning of the target's turn, if the target is Trapped, roll 1d12 and the target loses that much HP. Do not apply weakness or resistance to the HP lost. Do not apply stats to the HP lost. Clamp may not trap more then one target at a time unless the user is Huge or Gigantic.
move.Name: Clamp

move.Effect: Crabhammer Pushes the target 2-meters. Crabhammer is a Critical Hit on 18-20 during Accuracy Check.
move.Name: Crabhammer

move.Effect: Once you declare the use of Dive, the user is moved underwater and their turn ends. On the next turn, Dive's user may shift then use Dive's damage. While underwater, Dive's user may not be the target of Moves. There must be a body of water around the battlefield to use Dive.
move.Name: Dive

move.Effect: Hydro Cannon creates a 3-meter Blast. On Miss, Hydro Cannon deals the user's Special Attack instead to all possible targets.
move.Name: Hydro Cannon

move.Effect: Hydro Pump creates a Column 1 meter wide.
move.Name: Hydro Pump

move.Effect: Muddy Water makes a Column 4-meters wide. All Legal Targets must roll +2 during Accuracy Checks to hit on 16-20 during Accuracy Check.
move.Name: Muddy Water

move.Effect: All Legal Targets must roll +1 during Accuracy Checks to hit on 11-20 during Accuracy Check.
move.Name: Octazooka

move.Effect: For 1d4+1 rounds, the area is considered Rainy. While Rainy, Water-Type attacks deal 1.5x damage. Fire-Type attacks deal 1/2 the damage they normally would.
move.Name: Rain Dance

move.Effect: Razor Shell lowers the Target's Defense 1 Combat Stage on 11-20 during Accuracy Check.
move.Name: Razor Shell

move.Effect: Scald Burns the target on 15-20 during Accuracy Check.
move.Name: Scald

move.Effect: For 1d4+1 turns, the target's Elemental Type(s), become(s) Water Type.
move.Name: Soak

move.Effect: Surf makes a Column 4-meters wide.
move.Name: Surf

move.Effect: If used on the same turn as Fire Pledge, all secondary effects of Moves are activated at a -3 during the Accuracy Check for 1d4+1 turns. If used on the same turn as Grass Pledge, all foes are treated as if at -2 Speed Combat Stages for 1d4+1 turns, if any foe has additional Speed Combat Stages, apply them as usual.
move.Name: Water Pledge

move.Effect: Water Pulse creates a 3-meter Burst. Water Pulse Confuses all Legal Targets on 17-20 during Accuracy Check.
move.Name: Water Pulse

move.Effect: Water Sport makes a Coat that resists
move.Name: Water Sport

move.Effect: Water Spout creates a 10-meter Burst. Water Spout may not be performed unless the user has at least 90% of its HP.
move.Name: Water Spout

move.Effect: The target is Pushed 2-meters. If the target is airborne, Waterfall deals an additional 1d12 during Damage Dice Roll. Waterfall Flinches the target on 17-20 during Accuracy Check.
move.Name: Waterfall

move.Effect: Whirlpool Traps the target for 1d4+1 turns. At the beginning of the target's turn, if the target is Trapped, roll 1d12 and the target loses that much HP. Do not apply weakness or resistance to the HP lost. Do not apply stats to the HP lost. Whirlpool may not trap more then one target at a time.
move.Name: Whirlpool

move.Effect: Raises the user's Defense 1 Combat Stage.
move.Name: Withdraw
